name: Robot Doom (jam_mack46)
description:
Your gambling cyber overlord has thrust you into the arena. You must fight 10 levels to be freed. At the end of each level your gambling fool of an overlord rolls dice to sacrifice an ability.

WASD to move. 

Mouse to shoot. 

Survive 10 levels. 

Kill all enemy or survive the timer.

Dice at end of each level decides what ability is sacrificed. 

Choose upgrades wisely.

How does it fit theme: End of each level after dice are rolled you sacrifice an ability.

TIPS:

Reload best upgrade

Changed to 20 seconds timer for quicker playing
